about_the_game:
Beyond Hanwell Original Soundtrack by James Elsey

For the next chapter in the story of Hanwell, James built the score around a terrifying electro-acoustic instrument; 'The Esoteric Machine'. Deeply recording dark percussive scrapes, plucks and bowing on metal, these horrifying sounds would be met with aggressive, distorted synths and orchestral strings. Many themes from the original game return in new unique and ways, highlighted by Shila Vikström's haunting vocal performance.

Each track has been derived from the original loops from the game, turning them into a more musical listening experience, then mixed and mastered.

100% of revenue from the Beyond Hanwell Soundtrack goes directly to James, the composer.

name: Beyond Hanwell Soundtrack
short_description: Terrifying original soundtrack from Beyond Hanwell by James Elsey.
